thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 3 of 1678
thread.title: Brenda

author: Brenda
title: Brenda
text: I have been looking to book a flight from Calgary to Phoenix for a couple weeks now. I noticed prices were going up rapidly for the dates I was searching. My best priced flight was to book two different airlines. I spent over an hour booking my flight to Phoenix through Air Canada utilizing a credit voucher so this had to be done via telephone. In the last couple of minutes while waiting for the A/C travel agent to confirm my flight, I booked my return flight through Alaskan Airlines within seconds and was confirmed before the A/C travel agent returned from putting me on hold. Flighthub is fast, simple and seamless!!!
